Class: LineGraph

Suit.Components. LineGraph

new LineGraph(options)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
options list of options for configuring the chart. These include: minY - minimum value for Y Axis, accepted values are: Int || 'auto' maxY - maximum value for Y Axis, accepted values are: Int || 'auto'
